title: Strictly star Emma Weymouth’s husband left ‘furious’ after landing in dance-off
text:
Ceawlin Thynn and wife Emma Weymouth (Picture: David M. Benett/Dave Benett/Getty Images for Charles Finch)

Emma Weymouth’s husband was left furious after she landed in the bottom two on Strictly Come Dancing, according to reports.

Viscount Weymouth, whose name is Ceawlin Thynn, was watching the show with friends backstage when it was claimed he had to be calmed down over the results.

Speaking to The Sun, an onlooker said: ‘He was hopping mad – it made a real scene. Everyone had a few drinks so the volume levels were high.

‘When Emma joined him she seemed to be desperately trying to calm him down. It was rather awkward.’

Metro.co.uk has reached out to Strictly and Ceawlin’s reps for comment.

Ceawlin Thynn, Viscount of Weymouth, and Emma McQuiston, Viscountess of Weymouth (Picture: Mike Marsland/Mike Marsland/WireImage)

Emma and partner Aljaz Skorjanec found themselves in the dance-off against Dianne Buswell and Dev Griffin, with the latter pair getting booted from the show.

Advertisement

Advertisement

It was a shock elimination after Dev and Dianne were tipped for the final, with the pair surprised by the decision when they reunited on spin-off show It Takes Two.

Speaking on the show, Dev said: ‘Every single week is so different, I don’t think you can ever take your position from the week before for granted. The scores don’t carry over.

‘When I woke up that day I didn’t think I’d be in the bottom two, but you can never tell, can you?’

Dianne added: ‘I didn’t think that Dev would be in the bottom two for a while actually, if at all.

‘I think he did an amazing job on Saturday night and I thought his dance-off was even better.

‘I’m so proud of him, and just really upset that we were in the bottom two and we happened to leave the competition.’

Strictly Come Dancing continues on Saturday BBC One at 6.40pm.

MORE: Strictly Come Dancing fans call for BBC to release Sunday night’s voting results after Dev and Dianne’s shock exit

MORE: Strictly’s Mike Bushell will pay tribute to Fresh Prince’s Carlton as week 5 songs and dances revealed
description: Emma Weymouth's husband reportedly had to be 'calmed down' backstage during Sunday night's results show.
